thread.title: Man arrested in overdose death of UMass student
thread.title_full: Man arrested in overdose death of UMass student - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Man arrested in overdose death of UMass student
text:
AMHERST, Mass. (AP) - A New Hampshire man has been arrested in connection with the overdose death of a UMass student nearly two years ago.
Eric Sinacori, of Whitehouse Station, New Jersey, was found dead in his Amherst apartment October 4, 2013.
Prosecutors say 27-year-old Derry, New Hampshire, resident Jesse Carrillo was arrested Monday and charged with involuntary manslaughter and distributing heroin. It's unclear if he has an attorney.
Authorities say Carrillo, a former UMass graduate student, provided Sinacori with the heroin that caused the overdose.
Sinacori was working as an informant for campus police at the time. He was under investigation on drug charges but police agreed not to press charges if he cooperated with them. The university has since ended the program.
Carrillo is expected back to Massachusetts for arraignment later this week.
